description._content: Return a user's NSID, given their username.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: username
argument._content: The username of the user to lookup.

error._content: No user with the supplied username was found.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
